about.title: About Mr.üÜñ English Reading Assistant
about.description: AI-Powered Reading Companion for Students. Designed to help students master English reading through personalized, AI-powered learning experiences.

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.personalized: Personalized Learning - Content adapted to student's age (8-18 years old)
objectives.comprehension: Reading Comprehension - Build understanding through summaries, mind maps, and tests
objectives.vocabulary: Vocabulary Building - Interactive glossary with bilingual definitions
objectives.pronunciation: Text-to-Speech - Listen to words and sentences for better pronunciation
objectives.privacy: Privacy First - All data stored locally in the browser

features.title: Features
features.ocr: Image to Text - Extract text from textbooks, worksheets, or any reading material
features.adaptation: Smart Text Adaptation - Rewrites text to match student's reading level
features.visual: Visual Learning Tools - Summary and Mind Map generation
features.glossary: Vocabulary Builder - Bilingual glossary with context examples
features.tts: Text-to-Speech - Listen to highlighted words or sentences

workflow.title: How It Works
workflow.upload: Upload - Take or upload photos of reading materials
workflow.extract: Extract - AI extracts text from images via OCR
workflow.summarize: Summarize - Get a quick summary of the content
workflow.visualize: Visualize - Generate an interactive mind map
workflow.adapt: Adapt - Text is rewritten for the student's level
workflow.learn: Learn - Build vocabulary from highlighted words

about.builtWith: Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è by Mr.üÜñ for students learning English

quiz.question: Question
quiz.noQuizWords: Need at least 4 words for quiz

spelling.title: Spelling Challenge
spelling.subtitle: Practice spelling {{count}} words
spelling.notEnoughWords: Need at least 3 words for spelling game
spelling.aboutDesc: Practice spelling through interactive games designed to reinforce vocabulary learning.

modeDesc.listen-type: Listen to the word pronunciation and type what you hear. Great for auditory learning!
modeDesc.scramble: Rearrange jumbled letters to form the correct word. A visual puzzle approach!
modeDesc.fill-blanks: Type the missing letters shown as underscores. Focus on specific letter patterns!
modeDesc.mixed: Randomly switches between all modes for variety and comprehensive practice!

spelling.tipStreak: Build streaks for bonus points (+10% per 3 consecutive)
spelling.tipHint: Use hints wisely - they reveal letters but reduce your score

history.title: Reading History
history.description: Your reading sessions are stored locally in your browser.
history.name: Text Preview

setting.title: Settings
setting.description: All settings are saved in your browser.
setting.autoSpeakFlashcardTip: Automatically read the word aloud when a flashcard loads
setting.modeTip: In Paid mode, you pay for your AI usage. In EDU mode, Mr.üÜñ pays all AI costs for you.
setting.accessPasswordTip: üí° Get the access password from Mr.üÜñ
setting.languageTip: The system will auto-select based on your browser
setting.resetAllSettings: Reset all settings and clear cache
setting.resetSettingWarning: This will clear all data and reset the app.
